alert.note: Alert for Miami; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 13 at 5:45PM EST until February 13 at 6:30PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Southern Shelby County in west central Ohio... Northern Miami County in west central Ohio... * Until 630 PM EST. * At 544 PM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from near Sidney to near Covington, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Extremely poor visibility in heavy snow. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 77 and 100. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Piqua, Covington, Anna, Hardin, Fletcher, Port Jefferson, Lockington, Polo, Newbern, Ballou, Plattsville, Maplewood, Farrington, Swanders and Houston. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions.
